sentences.english: Almost all scholars didn' t notice Liu Shipei' s psychology after he betrayed revolution.
sentences.chinese: 劉師培叛變革命後有無愧疚心理，學界沒有提及。

sentences.english: The most valuable part is the writings on Zhang Taiyan and Liu Shipei.
sentences.chinese: 其中最有價值的是有關章太炎和劉師培的文章。
